resources.string: Separate multiple folders with a comma
Find All Files of Known Types
Are you sure you want to restart your device?

"Reboot in Progress
Please wait while the device is being restarted…"
Are you sure you want to switch off your device?

"Powered Off
Please press the Power button on the back to start again."
Do you want to save your changes?
cannot be opened because it is too large for the viewer
cannot be opened because it is too large for the editor
The size limit in kilobytes is
Define the file list font size in pixels
Are you sure you want to reset all the configuration settings to their original values?
Would you like to save and apply the configuration changes you have just made? The application will be restarted.
Home folders can be changed through the context menu
Home folders can only be changed in the settings
The launcher will start from the last visited folder
The launcher will start from the first designated home folder
Only home folders and their subfolders can be accessed
The whole filesystem can be freely traversed
Go Back Home on Reader Launch
Return to the main screen after opening a Favorite or a Recently Read file
Stay in the Favorites or Recently Read list after opening a file
Pop-up a list of all applications capable of opening the file
Automatically proceed with the first association
Use Book Titles Instead of File Names
Items will be listed using the format specified below
Items will be listed using their filenames
%a - author name, %t - book title, %s - series title, %n - number in series, %f - filename
Show Open With… in Context Menu
Files can be opened with a specific application from the context menu
Files can only be opened as determined by their association settings
Show Create Intent… in Context Menu
Intent for a file can be created from the context menu
Intents can only be modified through the settings
Detailed information will be shown under each item
Detailed information will be omitted from view
%Sb – size in bytes, %SKb – size in kilobytes, %SMb – size in megabytes, %D – date, %T – time
"The language has been changed, please restart ReLaunch to apply."
Show only files with created association
Show exit into the parent folder in the file list
Please provide a valid file type you would like to use this association with, preceded by a dot.
Choose How To Open Files of This Type

ReLaunch can either generate an intent with the type of your choice, or launch a specific application directly. With the former, which is the preferred way, when a file of this type is first opened, a list of all applications capable of opening it will show up, where you can then set one of them as default. Which method would you like to employ?
The number of partial refreshes after which the screen will be fully updated
ReLaunch will work in full-screen mode
The status bar on top will remain visible
Newly added files will be shown in bold
All files will be shown in the same way
Global font size for file and folder names in pixels
Font size for file details in pixels
File and folder icon size in pixels, use 0 to disable icons
Show Full Path as Folder Title
Full path to folder will be shown as its title
Only the immediate folder name will be shown as the title
Keep Names in Single Line Each
Allow names to break into multiple lines
Do not allow names to break into multiple lines
Columns in Files and Folders View (Default)
Use Row Separator in File and Folder List
Show File Operations First in Context Menu
Home, Recently Read, Favorites, Search, Settings
Parent Directory, Previous Page, Next Page, Power Menu
Tasks, Recent Apps, App Drawer, App Favorites, Battery & Wi-Fi
Lists will be filtered according to filtering rules
Hidden files and folders will be displayed
Hidden files and folders will be omitted from view
Do Not Show Type of Known Files
File type will not be shown unless not associated
Full filename will always be shown
Show Path Relative to Home Folder
Folder names will be shown relative to home location
Full paths will always be shown
Enable File Operations in Context Menu
File management options will be included in the context menu
File management options will not be shown
Each file deletion will need to be confirmed
Files can be deleted without confirmation
Each folder deletion will need to be confirmed
Folders can be deleted without confirmation
Deletion of non-empty folders will need to be confirmed
Non-empty folders can be deleted without confirmation
Tapping the icon will select the item
Tapping the icon will open the item, just as tapping its name would
Superuser access will be requested for navigation
No superuser privileges will be requested
Filter value cannot be left empty.
Home Button Tap and Hold Action
Recently Read Button Single Tap Action
Recently Read Button Double Tap Action
Recently Read Button Tap and Hold Action
Favorites Button Tap and Hold Action
Settings Button Tap and Hold Action
Power Menu Button Single Tap Action
Power Menu Button Double Tap Action
Power Menu Button Tap and Hold Action
Tasks Button Tap and Hold Action
Battery & Wi-Fi Button Single Tap Action
Battery & Wi-Fi Button Double Tap Action
Battery & Wi-Fi Button Tap and Hold Action
Application Favorites Button Single Tap Action
Application Favorites Button Double Tap Action
Application Favorites Button Tap and Hold Action
Application Drawer Button Single Tap Action
Application Drawer Button Double Tap Action
Application Drawer Button Tap and Hold Action
Recent Applications Button Single Tap Action
Recent Applications Button Double Tap Action
Recent Applications Button Tap and Hold Action
Search Button Tap and Hold Action
Launcher Mode When Invoked as Home
When started by the Home button, ReLaunch will run as launcher
When started by the Home button, ReLaunch will run as a regular application
Launcher Mode When Invoked as Library
When started by the Library button, ReLaunch will run as launcher
When started by the Library button, ReLaunch will run as a regular application
Launcher Mode When Invoked as Shop
When started by the Shop button, ReLaunch will run as launcher
When started by the Shop button, ReLaunch will run as a regular application
Go Back Home on Application Launch
After launching an application, ReLaunch will return to the main screen
After launching an application, ReLaunch will stay in the application list
ReLaunch will not be shown in Application Drawer
Application Drawer will also show ReLaunch
US-style date format will be used (mm/dd/yyyy)
European-style date format will be used (dd.mm.yyyy)
It is permitted to close the application
Closing the application is not allowed
Prev and Next buttons will only react to single taps
Double tap on Prev or Next to scroll faster, tap and hold to jump to first or last entry respectively
How much will be scrolled in a single advance, in percent
Generic system scrollbar will be used
Scrollbar width when customization is enabled
Left margin width when scrollbar customization is enabled
Pressing the Back button will close ReLaunch
Pressing the Back button will switch to parent folder
Maximum number of items returned in search results
Search progress will be updated every this many files
Largest file size in kilobytes (thousands of bytes) that can be opened with the built-in viewer
Largest file size in bytes that can be opened with the built-in editor
Number of recently read items that will be remembered
Maximum number of items that can be stored as favorites
Number of recently used applications that will be remembered
Maximum number of applications that can be marked as favorite
Maximum number of OPDS catalogs that will be remembered
Location the files will be saved to
Folder the files will be downloaded from
Retain local files not present on the server
Local files will be deleted if not present on the server
Dropbox files will be deleted if not present on the device
Retain Dropbox files not present on the device
Location the files will be saved to
Local folder for temporary FTP files
Your settings have been successfully backed up to SD card.
Your settings have been successfully restored from the SD card. The application will now restart with the new settings.
The operation could not be completed.

Are you sure you want to remove all database files?
Are you sure you want to clear the Recently Read list?
Are you sure you want to clear the Favorites list?

Possible Incompatibility Warning
